title: Knock ups are gonna to be reduced by tenacity
body: you know why? cause this will not nerf lee win he has a knock back

replies.body: the secondary targets of his ult recive a knock up, your argument is invalid

Such intersting pessimism towards what I think is a pretty positive change. I can find dozens of threads regarding frustration that tenacity does not affect knock ups but now that the coin has been flip we still see aggression. Just a prime example that you can never please everyone.

> Such intersting pessimism towards what I think is a pretty positive change. I can find dozens of threads regarding frustration that tenacity does not affect knock ups but now that the coin has been flip we still see aggression. Just a prime example that you can never please everyone.

not really you will nerf xin zhao alistar sion yasuo but not lee sin as always
I can point you towards patch notes in the past with lee sin nerfs if you prefer ?

You wish you could surpass the Hanar and Chumbler, but alas, you cannot.

You will never overcome them. They will always tower over plebians such as yourself.

For they are... the original... the unintellegent... the...........  trollerinoesplsnocopypasterino

Riot is gonna have a problem if they make knockups reduced by tenacity but don't make any other changes. The champions right now that have knockups are balanced around their CC being a knockup, usually through lower duration than other hard CC or by being harder to use.
They just wanna nerf yasuo a lil more
That would be a buff to Irelia.
no every good jungler atm use a knockup and they can't compete with lee win free win so riot nerf them
